metadata.title: CVE-2015-7513 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
arch/x86/kvm/x86.c in the Linux kernel before 4.4 does not reset the PITcounter values during state restoration, which allows guest OS users tocause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and host OS crash) via azero value, related to the kvm_vm_ioctl_set_pit and kvm_vm_ioctl_set_pit2functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7513` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
